alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Goshen and north central Laramie Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Gun Barrel, or 26 miles northeast of Cheyenne, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Goshen and north central Laramie Counties. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County
